title: Accounting equation. Parts 1-4
creator_credit: Niels Ellmoos, Bill Renwick and Interaction Media
brief_description: A four part instructional series following a ‘real-life’ business entity in Newcastle, Australia, through one month’s trading, to the presentation of financial statements.
